ygData.subject: Re: Weapon selections..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe well im small (Wood elf) so no problem there.. ... That was my impression as well, so thats what Ive been using. ... (btw my dex IS above 100, 110 or
ygData.messageBody:
>--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Big Daddy Legba" <legba@c...> wrote:
>> Heh, he said Ebon Razor was primary only (which I think it is)
>
>It is.. and unfortunately, it's small races only as well. : /
>

Hehe well im small (Wood elf) so no problem there..

>With the weapons listed, I'll deviate from the advice already given
>and say you're better off with the Ebon Razor in primary and SSoY in
>secondary. At least for those specific weapons.
>

That was my impression as well, so thats what Ive been using.

>To use the SSoY in your primary, and take advantage of the extra
>proc, you'll have to put an inferior weapon in your secondary. The
>Ebon Razor is close enough in damage output (it has a better ratio)
>to the SSoY that I think you'll have better total damage with this
>combination than with the SSoY and any other weapon you currectly
>have in your second hand.
>
>But, as has been suggested, getting a better offhand weapon might be
>the best solution long term. Only problem, on Xegony, Sionatchies
>Partisans are hard to come by. I've been looking for weeks and weeks
>to no avail.
>
(btw my dex IS above 100, 110 or 108 dont, but defently above 100)

Yes a better off hand weapon is proberly one sollution. I have been thinking of
getting a second yak. My guild can help me there, but the thing is
Im not all that impressed with the yak the effects are resisted alot by many
mobs and I would for sure prefer a thing like the sioanitchie.

>Run some /log on tests with a Parser to see which combination is
>giving you better results.
>
>Darkfox Reven'tsol
>Xegony

Duh, I will do that :o)

Thanks for the advice you all. Knew I could count on you. This list is the
bestest *smile*!

So I think I will keep the Ebon razor in primary hand and put the yak in my
secondary.
Then I will look for a good piercer or maybe a second yak to replace the Razor.

Musiker(x) Silverdrum <Creators Path>, bard o 38th song, bertox
